general_advisory: In paddy crop, Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering and milking stages are the critical stages. Cover the rows with dry leaves in Sugarcane. Apply sprinkler irrigation to bring down the heat effect. The high temperature increases the water requirement of maize crop. Spread polythene in irrigation channels to save water wastage in sandy and loamy soil. High temperature in day hours may lead to wilting in tomato and brinjal. Mulch coconut leaves around a coconut tree to reduce water loss. Cover the newly planted vegetable seedlings during daytime. Harvest fingerlings if water temperature rises.

advisory: Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering and milking stages are critical stages. Avoid water deficit.
Cover rows with dry leaves in Sugarcane.
Top-dress with 4% potassium to protect crop from water scarcity during summer.
High temperature increases the water requirement of maize crop. Never allow water to remain stagnant for more than six hours in the field.
Apply 1g of Streptocyclin in 10 liter water in root zone to prevent wilting.
Install pheromone traps for Brinjal shoot and fruit borer management.
Apply neem-based pesticide at the primary stage of pest infestation.
Mulch coconut leaves around a coconut tree to reduce water loss.
Cover newly planted vegetable seedlings during daytime.
Harvest fingerlings if water temperature rises.
